name: Buble!
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl && sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings && sudo curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc && sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc && echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(. /etc/os-release && echo "$VERSION_CODENAME") stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin && sudo usermod -aG docker $USER && sudo systemctl enable docker && sudo systemctl start docker && sleep 10 && docker --version && sudo docker info && docker run -d --rm --network host -v /tmp/firefox:/config jlesage/firefox
